backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a dental clinic app managing appointments, reviews, doctors, services, before/after gallery, and user profiles with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report identifying a bug fix task for the admin panel Appointments page, listing the affected files and components related to AdminGuard sessionStorage checks and backend authorization.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, page, and hook.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app file configuring TanStack Router with all public and admin routes, wrapping the tree in QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider, and using AdminGuard for protected admin routes.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that waits for Internet Identity initialization, then verifies both the sessionStorage 'adminAuth' flag and a valid II identity before rendering children, redirecting unauthenticated users to home.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundPartic: Animated background component that spawns and animates floating dental emoji particles using requestAnimationFrame with fade-in/out lifecycle management.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterSlide: A React component that renders a draggable before/after image comparison slider with three static dental treatment pairs, supporting both mouse and touch interactions.
frontend/src/components/BookAppointmentD: A modal dialog component for booking dental appointments, with a form for patient details and a success/error state, submitting data via a React Query mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ClinicStatusBann: Displays a top banner warning when the clinic is closed or in emergency-only mode, hiding itself when the clinic is open.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: A contact section displaying clinic phone, email, address, and hours in cards, plus a WhatsApp link, with an animated staggered text heading.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: A placeholder component for a custom cursor that is currently disabled, rendering nothing.
frontend/src/components/DoctorProfile.ts: Displays a profile section for Dr. Priya Sharma with her photo, bio, stats, and specialty tags, using a staggered text reveal animation for the heading.
frontend/src/components/FloatingDentalEl: Renders fixed-position, semi-transparent floating dental icon images with a bobbing CSS animation as a decorative background layer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer with brand info, quick links, services list, and contact details, plus a hidden admin login modal triggered from within the footer.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed navigation header with scroll-aware styling, smooth-scroll nav links, mobile menu toggle, and a 'Book Appointment' button that opens a dialog.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-viewport hero section with a background image, animated floating dental icons, staggered text reveal heading, and a call-to-action button that opens the booking dialog.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminLogin: Two-step admin login modal that first validates hardcoded credentials then triggers Internet Identity authentication before redirecting to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/LiquidGradientBa: Full-screen canvas component that renders an animated, mouse-reactive liquid gradient background using radial blobs and a shifting linear gradient.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate icons and a loading spinner during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Wrapper component that applies a magnetic hover effect, translating its children toward the cursor on mouse move and resetting on mouse leave.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: Fixed top progress bar that fills horizontally based on the user's scroll position on the page.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Grid section displaying dental services with icons, fetched from the backend or falling back to static data, with hover glow effects and navigation to individual service pages.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialCarou: Renders an auto-scrolling infinite carousel of patient testimonials with star ratings, using requestAnimationFrame for smooth animation and a staggered text reveal for the section heading.
frontend/src/components/TypewriterText.t: A component that animates text with a typewriter effect character-by-character once the element scrolls into view, using the useScrollReveal hook.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Displays a modal dialog prompting newly authenticated users to enter their name and create a profile, blocking dismissal until the profile is saved.
frontend/src/components/ZoomInImage.tsx: Wraps an image with a scroll-triggered zoom-in and fade-in animation using the useScrollReveal hook.
frontend/src/context/CursorContext.tsx: Provides a React context for tracking and setting the current cursor icon type ('default' or 'dental') across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlassmorphismRevea: An IntersectionObserver hook that sets a visibility flag once an element enters the viewport, intended for triggering glassmorphism reveal animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status through a React context and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, appointments, clinic status, reviews, and doctor availability using the useActor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: A generic IntersectionObserver hook that returns a ref and an isVisible boolean, triggering once when the element scrolls into view.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaggeredTextRevea: Splits a string into words and returns per-word inline styles that animate each word in with a staggered delay once the container element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextScramble.ts: Animates text with a scramble effect on scroll-into-view, progressively resolving random characters to the target string over ~1 second using setInterval.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using oklch colors, and declares keyframe animations (floatBob, scrollPulse, successPop, etc.) plus scroll-reveal utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: A full-page access denied screen displayed when a user lacks admin permissions, with a styled card and a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Appointments.ts: Admin page that lists all appointments in a table with status badges and allows admins to update appointment statuses, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BeforeAfterMana: Admin page for uploading before/after image pairs with drag-and-drop support, description input, and upload progress tracking.
Admin page with a form to submit patient reviews (name, text, star rating) that enter a pending state awaiting approval before public display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying navigation cards for all admin sections (appointments, services, reviews, etc.) and a clinic status toggle (open/closed/emergency) with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DoctorScheduler: Admin page for adding new doctors (name and specialty) and listing existing doctors, using React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations.
Admin page for moderating pending patient reviews, allowing admins to approve or delete each review with star rating display and optional photo.
Admin CMS page for editing dental service details (display name, description, featured photo) for a predefined list of premium services, with file upload progress tracking.
Detail page for the Dental Implants service featuring a hero section with an image, a benefits grid, and a booking dialog triggered by a 'Book Now' button.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main landing page that composes all major sections (Hero, Services, Doctor Profile, Before/After, Testimonials, Contact) with scroll-reveal animations applied to each section.
frontend/src/pages/InvisalignDetail.tsx: Detail page for the Invisalign service with a hero section, an embedded BeforeAfterSlider, a benefits grid, and a booking dialog.
Detail page for the Laser Dentistry service featuring a themed hero with a decorative laser beam element, a benefits section, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PediatricDentistryDet: Detail page for the Pediatric Dentistry service with a green-themed hero, a 'Why Kids Love Us' features grid, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Displays a detail page for a specific dental service fetched by serviceId, showing a featured photo, description, feature highlights, and a booking dialog trigger.
frontend/src/pages/SmileMakeoverDetail.t: Static detail page for the Smile Makeover service featuring a hero section, before/after slider, and a list of included treatments with a booking dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing helper functions to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (teal, royal-blue, semantic CSS variable-based colors), fonts, border radii, box shadows, and animations including mesh gradient and float bob keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a fix request to resolve the admin panel Appointments page not loading, specifically targeting AdminGuard sessionStorage auth checks and backend role authorization for fetching all appointments.
